column2: The religious authority of the Fire Nation, the Fire Sages are tasked with identifying the reincarnation of the Avatar.
The reign of this person is decorated in rich lore, both fact and fiction. Very few know of this figure's true life story outside of second-hand retellings.
Fallen from grace, this Sage's personality and habits are very inappropriate for their position. Some say that the spirits themselves are sure to curse them for their debauchery.
This character is Firelord in name only, and is not fully respected as reigning sovereign of the Fire Nation.
